topics.body:
"@DiegoB":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5497b23b6368722304990800#post_5497b23b6368722304990800
Just art in general. I always like seeing peoples ideas coming to life and that's something I want to do, I want to see my ideas and others ideas come to life in animation, comics, music, movies, and even writing like you! Etc

Me, I like to draw, drawing has always been my favorite thing to do! I just have to get better at it.

I plan on doing things like Animation and game design. hopefully I can get there.

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5497b58463687224b4a40900#post_5497b58463687224b4a40900
Well you can get there as long as you are willing to work hard. Talent is good but it's really how many hours a day you dedicate to something that makes a difference.

I remember once that someone told me that if I wanted to be a writer, I had to write everyday or learn something about writing everyday. That days off were for people who didn't need or want success. In fact, if you say writing is your passion, then this shouldn't be a problem for you.

I would give you the same advice, just change drawing for animation and game designing. 

Do you have art here or in devian art that I could look at?
topics.author: 521b8244a4c72d5052005638

topics.body:
"@DiegoB":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5497b46763687207cbd80100#post_5497b46763687207cbd80100
One of the main things Jojo has above most Shonen Manga is that Every Arc gets a new cast of characters. (The main character of the stardust crusaders arc, Jotaro Kujo, Became a supporting character for the Diamond is unbreakable cast)

That way, It doesn't get stale like say, Dragonball or Naruto.
